title: FS: Raw and graded T210 Red Borders (Series 6, 7, 8 cards added)
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: FS: Raw and graded T210 Red Borders (Series 6, 7, 8 cards added)
posts.post_content:
Here are some T210s for sale. Prices are shipped, PM if interested. PayPal F&F or another fee-free payment method preferred. I've removed sold cards from the previous version of this post, and added series 6, 7, and 8 cards, all of which are tough.

Graded cards: 
Kirkpatrick, Portsmouth, Series 2, SGC A $60 (PENDING)
Sharp, Lynchburg, Series 2, SGC 10 $40

Series 3:
Jolley, Ft. Worth $70 (PENDING)
Deardorff, Ft. Worth $100
Williams, Waco $50
Berlick, Dallas $60
Gowdy, Dallas $70 (17 year MLB career) (PENDING)

Series 6:
Ellis, Lexington $120 SOLD
Heveron, Lexington $70 SOLD
Kircher, Shelbyville $80 SOLD
McKernan, Paris $100 SOLD
Olson, Richmond $100 SOLD
Schultz, Maysville $50 SOLD
Tilford, Richmond $150 SOLD
Womble, Shelbyville $60 (PENDING)

Series 7
Luyster, Fayettesville $80
Wright, Raleigh $70

Series 8
Pepe, Montgomery $100
Smith, Montgomery $80
Thomas, Montgomery $70
